challenges.name: Graffiti
challenges.description: Deploy a Glyph while on a mission.

challenges.name: Sword Dance
challenges.description: Kill |COUNT| Enemies with a Melee Weapon.

challenges.name: Mow Them Down
challenges.description: Kill |COUNT| Enemies with a Primary Weapon.

challenges.name: Smaller is Bigger
challenges.description: Kill |COUNT| Enemies with a Secondary Weapon.

challenges.name: Surf's Up!
challenges.description: Kill |COUNT| enemies while riding a K-Drive.

challenges.name: Reanimator
challenges.description: Find and pilot a Fallen Necramech.

challenges.name: Ancient Obelisk
challenges.description: Activate a Requiem Obelisk on Deimos.

challenges.name: Liquidation
challenges.description: Sell any item in your Inventory for Credits.

challenges.name: Two for One
challenges.description: Pierce and kill 2 or more enemies in a single Bow shot.

challenges.name: Swatter
challenges.description: Kill |COUNT| Drones or Ospreys with your Melee Weapon.

challenges.name: Topping Off the Tank
challenges.description: Successfully defend an Excavator without allowing it to run out of power.

challenges.name: Augmentation
challenges.description: Install an Augment Mod on your Warframe.

challenges.name: A Firm Shake
challenges.description: Shake the hand of a fellow Tenno using the Handshake Emote.

challenges.name: Builder’s Touch
challenges.description: Claim an item from your Foundry.

challenges.name: Medic
challenges.description: Revive a fellow Tenno or a Companion.

challenges.name: Stay on top
challenges.description: Kill |COUNT| enemies using a Necramech while hovering.

challenges.name: Earth Fisher
challenges.description: Catch |COUNT| Rare Fish in the Plains of Eidolon.

challenges.name: Venus Fisher
challenges.description: Catch |COUNT| Rare Servofish in the Orb Vallis.

challenges.name: Good Friend
challenges.description: Help Clem with his weekly mission.

challenges.name: Invader
challenges.description: Complete |COUNT| Invasion missions of any type.

challenges.name: Sound Sleeper
challenges.description: Complete |COUNT| Nightmare missions of any type.

challenges.name: Earth Miner
challenges.description: Mine |COUNT| Rare Gems or Ore in the Plains of Eidolon.

challenges.name: Venus Miner
challenges.description: Mine |COUNT| Rare Gems or Ore in the Orb Vallis.

challenges.name: Conservationist
challenges.description: Complete |COUNT| different Perfect Animal Captures in Orb Vallis.

challenges.name: Earth Bounty Hunter
challenges.description: Complete |COUNT| different Bounties in the Plains of Eidolon.

challenges.name: Cache Hunter
challenges.description: Find all caches in |COUNT| Sabotage missions.

challenges.name: Vault Looter
challenges.description: Unlock |COUNT| Dragon Key vaults on Deimos.

challenges.name: Polarized
challenges.description: Polarize a Weapon, Companion, or Warframe (not in Simulacrum).

challenges.name: Venus Bounty Hunter
challenges.description: Complete |COUNT| different Bounties in the Orb Vallis.

challenges.name: Night and Day
challenges.description: Collect |COUNT| Vome or Fass Residue in the Cambion Drift.

challenges.name: Loyalty
challenges.description: Gain a total of |COUNT| Standing across all Syndicate factions.

challenges.name: Mad Lab
challenges.description: Plunder one of Alad V's secret laboratories on Jupiter.

challenges.name: The Old Ways
challenges.description: Complete 1 mission with only a single pistol and a glaive equipped.

challenges.name: Ascendant
challenges.description: Complete |COUNT| Halls of Ascension on Lua.

challenges.name: Night Terror
challenges.description: Complete |COUNT| Nightmare missions of any type.

challenges.name: Elite Test Subject
challenges.description: Complete |COUNT| Zones of Elite Sanctuary Onslaught.

challenges.name: Silent Eliminator
challenges.description: Complete an Extermination mission with only level 30 or higher enemies without triggering alarms.

challenges.name: Defense
challenges.description: Complete a Defense mission reaching at least Wave 20.

challenges.name: Survival
challenges.description: Complete a Survival mission reaching at least 30 minutes.

challenges.name: Day Trader
challenges.description: Win 3 wagers in a row without letting the enemy score in one match of The Index.

challenges.name: Hydrolyst Hunter
challenges.description: Kill or Capture an Eidolon Hydrolyst.

challenges.name: Hold Your Breath
challenges.description: Survive for over 30 minutes in Kuva Survival.

challenges.name: Vault Raider
challenges.description: Complete an Isolation Vault Bounty Mission in the Cambion Drift on Deimos.

challenges.name: Cold Steel
challenges.description: Kill |COUNT| Enemies on The Steel Path.

challenges.name: Antiquarian
challenges.description: Open one of each era/tier of Relic (Lith, Meso, Neo, Axi) |COUNT|.

challenges.name: The Price of Freedom
challenges.description: Free one Captured Solaris using a Granum Crown.

challenges.name: The Many Made Whole
challenges.description: Convert 10 Riven Slivers into a Riven Mod.

challenges.name: Rise of the Machine
challenges.description: Kill |COUNT| enemies using a Necramech without getting destroyed.

rewards.name: Chitoid Sentinel Bundle
rewards.description: Give any sentinel a flair of Infestation with this pack. Contains Chitoid Sentinel Mask, Chitoid Sentinel Wings, and Chitoid Sentinel Tail.

ranks.name: Tactical System
ranks.description: Deploy Tactical Mods and access Crew tracking system via Tactical Menu |TACT_MENU|.

ranks.name: Ability Kinesis and Overseer
ranks.description: Warframe abilities can be deployed as tactical support. Enables crew chase camera.

ranks.name: Command Link
ranks.description: Fast Travel within vessel. Coordinate squad members with command interface.

ranks.name: Recall Warp
ranks.description: Omni gear can be used to warp aboard the ship from anywhere.

ranks.name: Deploy Necramechs
ranks.description: Deploy Necramechs in all Railjack missions.

ranks.name: Tactical Efficiency
ranks.description: Reduces Energy Consumption for Battle Mods by 25%.

ranks.name: Tactical Response
ranks.description: Reduces Tactical Mod cooldown by 20%.

ranks.name: Archwing Tactical Blink and Necramech Cooldown
ranks.description: Reduces Archwing Blink cooldown by 25%. Reduces Necramech summon cooldown by 25%.

ranks.name: Swift Tactics
ranks.description: Further reduces Tactical Mod cooldown by 20%.

ranks.name: Join Warp
ranks.description: Warp from ship to crew member.

ranks.name: Boost
ranks.description: Hold |SPRINT| to boost Engine Speed. Firing pilot guns interrupts boosting.

ranks.name: Vector Maneuver
ranks.description: Tap |ACTION| to burst Directional Thrusters.

ranks.name: Vectored Evasion
ranks.description: Near-by enemy projectiles lose lock-on during Vector Maneuver.

ranks.name: Drift Maneuver
ranks.description: During Vector, press & hold |SPRINT| to drift.

ranks.name: Boosted Scavenger
ranks.description: Increase loot pickup radius by 3x while boosting, drifting or dodging. Hidden derelicts are marked.

ranks.name: Ram Jammer
ranks.description: A 25% chance of jamming an incoming Ramsled's targeting systems, causing them to overshoot and explode.

ranks.name: Necramech Haste
ranks.description: Necramech Movement Speed increased by 10%.

ranks.name: Aeronaut
ranks.description: Archwing Speed increased by 20%.

ranks.name: Ramming Speed
ranks.description: Reduce Incoming Damage by 2000% while Boosting. Ramming into enemies while Boosting will deal 25 <DT_IMPACT>Impact Damage.

ranks.name: Railjack Blink
ranks.description: Double-tap <JUMP> to instantly translate the Railjack forward, leaving a trail of turbulence that slows nearby enemies.

ranks.name: Target Sync
ranks.description: Target lead indicators and ordnance lock-on.

ranks.name: Phantom Eye
ranks.description: Augmented reprojection and turret suspensors allows full 360 degree combat engagement.

ranks.name: Archwing Slingshot
ranks.description: High velocity Archwing deployment into the combat zone. Slingshot Archwing damages fighters and penetrates enemy crewship hulls.

ranks.name: Archwing Fury
ranks.description: Increase Archwing Attraction Range by 0.75m and Melee Range by 20m and Damage by 25%.

ranks.name: Necramech Fury
ranks.description: Increase Necramech Gun Damage by 20%.

ranks.name: Cold Trigger
ranks.description: Reduce Turret Heat Accretion by 20%.

ranks.name: Advanced Gunnery
ranks.description: Reduce overheat recovery time by 50%. Extends Slingshot range by 50%.

ranks.name: Vengeful Archwing
ranks.description: Increases Archwing power: Damage +20%, Ability Strength +20%, Ability Range +20%, and Ability Efficiency +25%.

ranks.name: Flush Heat Sinks
ranks.description: Reloading when weapons are overheated will cool weapons to 0 in 0.5 secs.

ranks.name: Reflex Aim
ranks.description: Turret aim will snap to lead indicator for 3s but the Turret overheats 20% faster.

ranks.name: Applied Omni
ranks.description: Accelerated hazard suppression and hull repair.

ranks.name: Rapid Support
ranks.description: Decrease cooldown for Air Support Charges by 50%.

ranks.name: Ordnance Forge
ranks.description: Replenish combat Ordnance while deployed.

ranks.name: Dome Charge Forge
ranks.description: Resupply Forward Artillery cannon during combat.

ranks.name: Optimized Forge
ranks.description: Increase Forge yields by 1%. Craft Hull Restores.

ranks.name: Forge Accelerator
ranks.description: Increase Forge processing speed by 25%.

ranks.name: Full Optimization
ranks.description: Further increase Forge yields by 25%.

ranks.name: Vigilant Archwing
ranks.description: Increase Archwing defense. Health +30%, Shield +30%, and Armor +30%.

ranks.name: Vigilant Necramech
ranks.description: Increase Necramech defense. Health +25%. Shields +25%.

ranks.name: Anastasis
ranks.description: Remotely repair onboard hazards.

ranks.name: 1st Crew Member
ranks.description: Unlocks the first crew member and the ability to hire them from Ticker.

ranks.name: Competency Gain
ranks.description: Allows you to give 1 competency point to your crew members.

ranks.name: 2nd Crew Member
ranks.description: Unlocks the second crew member.

ranks.name: Competency Gain
ranks.description: Allows you to give 1 competency point to your crew members.

ranks.name: 3rd Crew Member
ranks.description: Unlocks the third crew member.

ranks.name: Competency Gain
ranks.description: Allows you to give 1 competency point to your crew members.

ranks.name: Competency Retraining
ranks.description: Allows you to redistribute previously assigned competency points.

ranks.name: Unusual Crewmates
ranks.description: Converted Liches become available as Defender Crew on your Railjack.

ranks.name: On Call
ranks.description: One of your crew members can be designated as being On Call and can be summoned to aid you in non-Railjack missions.

ranks.name: Elite Crewmates
ranks.description: Stronger crew members become available for recruitment from Ticker.

ExportOther.name: Kavat Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: Change a kavat's coat coloration to match that of the Adarza or Smeeta Kavat species.

ExportOther.name: Neura Kavat Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: Customize a Kavat's fur color with these isolated DNA sequences.

ExportOther.name: Deaeira Kavat Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: Surviving records state the Deaeira Kavat strain was developed and much-favored by the Orokin. [Tenno's Best Friend Contest winner]

ExportOther.name: Moonless Kavat Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: A kavat pattern ideal for the nighttime hunt.

ExportOther.name: Hyekka Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: Degenerate a kavat into a furless Hyekka by altering its DNA structure.

ExportOther.name: Krest Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: Customize a Kavat’s fur color with these isolated DNA sequences.

ExportOther.name: Nesyr Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: Customize a Kavat’s fur color with these isolated DNA sequences.

ExportOther.name: Nexus Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: Customize a Kavat’s fur color with these isolated DNA sequences.

ExportOther.name: Tibor Prime Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: Complement your Kavat’s Tibor Armor with this elegant primed gene-mask.

ExportOther.name: Solstice Kavat Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: Customize a Kavat’s fur color with these isolated DNA sequences.

ExportOther.name: Argyl Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: Customize a Kavat’s fur color with these isolated DNA sequences.

ExportOther.name: Basic Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: Provides basic masking options for a Kubrow's innate DNA structure, allowing coat color customization.

ExportOther.name: Nistlebrush Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: This tool provides all of the genetic information to mask a Kubrow's innate DNA structure and allows a Tenno to customize its fur pattern.

ExportOther.name: Heino Kubrow Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: Fur pattern matching your Kubrow's Heino ancestors, from a gene-line preserved by Kubrow master Skvirl. [Tenno's Best Friend Contest winner]

ExportOther.name: Arklut Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: This tool provides all of the genetic information to mask a Kubrow's innate DNA structure and allows a Tenno to customize its fur pattern.

ExportOther.name: Nart-Deer Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: This tool provides all of the genetic information to mask a Kubrow's innate DNA structure and allows a Tenno to customize its fur pattern.

ExportOther.name: Solstice Kubrow Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: This tool provides all of the genetic information to mask a Kubrow's innate DNA structure and allows a Tenno to customize its fur pattern.

ExportOther.name: Telmatian Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: This tool provides all of the genetic information to mask a Kubrow's innate DNA structure and match the fur pattern of its Telmatian Kubrow ancestors.

ExportOther.name: Savenga Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: This tool provides all of the genetic information to mask a Kubrow's innate DNA structure and match the fur pattern of its Savenga Kubrow ancestors.

ExportOther.name: Tigrol Gene-Masking Kit
ExportOther.description: This tool provides all of the genetic information to mask a Kubrow's innate DNA structure and match the fur pattern of its Tigrol Kubrow ancestors.

ExportOther.name: Prized Companion Skin Pack
ExportOther.description: Raise a prize-winning companion with this fur-patterning for Kubrow and Kavat. Contains both the Heino Kubrow Fur Pattern and Deaeira Kavat Fur Pattern. [Tenno's Best Friend Contest winners]

ExportOther.name: Eos Prime Armor Set
ExportOther.description: A full set of decorative armor for your Warframe.
